name: phila.gov-theme
description: A custom wordpress theme for phila.gov

scripts.dev:css: node-sass --include-path node_modules/font-awesome/scss --include-path node_modules/phila-standards/src/sass --source-map true css/scss/base.scss css/styles.css
scripts.build:css: node-sass --include-path node_modules/font-awesome/scss --include-path node_modules/phila-standards/src/sass --output-style compressed --source-map true css/scss/base.scss css/styles.min.css
scripts.dev:build: npm run dev:css && npm run dev:js
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:css

author: City of Philadelphia
